answers.answer: I'd suggest a physical with blood work.  A wound, which does not heal properly (as described) may be a sign of diabetes, which is showing up in younger and younger folks...if caught early enough, the condition is very controllable.

question: Has anyone received a treatment for this problem?  My boyfriend has developed this same problem.  A small cut which eventually heals, but always comes back after intercouse or masturbation.  It's really bothering him!Thanks.
title: Cuts on penis
